text: If  you were lucky enough to see Aphex Twin's first live show in years last weekend in Houston, there was also the opportunity to pick up a "mysterious new record". You can find that record below. Not surprisingly, it's amazing! <http://pitchfork.com/news/70487-aphex-twin-sells-mysterious-new-record-in-houston/>  <https://www.dropbox.com/s/mjk01ifwfjk7j02/KL%20Twin%20V0.zip?dl=0>
